Variation of the Reaction Conditions for Cross-Coupling of Allylboronic Acid 2a with α-Diazoketone 1aa aUnless otherwise stated a mixture of1a(0.12 mmol),2a(0.10 mmol), Pd catalyst (10 mol %), and the additive (20 mol %) in CH2Cl2(0.5 mL) was stirred for 1 h at rt. bIsolated yield. c1a(0.10 mmol),2a(0.12 mmol), and Pd catalyst (10 mol %) were used. dThe reaction was performed with 10 equiv oftBuOH. e1awas added in two portions.

Palladium Catalyzed Cross-Coupling of Allylboronic Acids with α-Diazoketonesa Table aUnless otherwise stated a mixture of1(0.12 mmol, added in two portions),2(0.10 mmol), Pd(OAc)2(10 mol %), and CuI (20 mol %) in CH2Cl2(0.5 mL) were stirred at rt for 1 h.
